message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this amazing product. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm looking to save some money on this product. I'm willing to pay $10500 for it. Can you consider this price?
I understand your concerns about the price, Bob, but I'm still looking to get a good deal for my product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $11500. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still looking to save some more. I'm willing to pay $11000 for the product. Can you consider this price?
I understand you're trying to save some more, Bob, but I'm getting closer to my minimum price. I'm willing to give you a small concession and offer it to you for $11250. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $10800 for the product. Can you consider this price?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob, and I'm not willing to go any lower. I'm willing to give you a final concession and offer it to you for $11000. This is my best price. What do you think?
I understand that this is your best price, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with it. I'm willing to pay $10900 for the product. Can you reconsider?

I've already given you a significant concession, Bob, and I'm not willing to go any lower. I'm afraid I'll have to stand firm at my original price of $12000. If you're not willing to meet me at that price, I'll have to consider other options.
